member.name: M:FLEXYGO.Filtering.Search.GetSearchCriterias(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the search string for current user.
member.param: Returns only searches for given object. Returns all if blank
member.example: select * from [Objects] where exists ( -- BUILD SELECT Select * from {{Main Object Table}} o -- BUILD RUTES RELATIONS FOR EACH TABLE IN PATHS inner join {{Path Object Table}} On o.{{Main Object Table primary Key}}={{Path Object Table}}.{{PATH Object Table primary Key}} -- BUILD COMBOS inner join({{combo SQL Sentence}}) cmb1 On cmb1.{{combo ValueFiled }}= {{PATH Object Table}}.{{FILTER Propertyname}} -- BUILD WHERE where -- BUILD FILTER (o.Descrip Like '%x%' or o.ObjectName like '%x%' or Objects_properties.PropertyName like '%x%' or cmb1.descrip like '%' ) -- BUILD RELATION And {{Main Object Table}}.{{Main Object Table primary Key}} = o.{{Main Object Table primary Key}} )

member.param: Returns only searches for given object. Returns all if blank
member.example: select * from [Objects] where exists ( -- BUILD SELECT Select * from {{Main Object Table}} o -- BUILD RUTES RELATIONS FOR EACH TABLE IN PATHS inner join {{Path Object Table}} On o.{{Main Object Table primary Key}}={{Path Object Table}}.{{PATH Object Table primary Key}} -- BUILD COMBOS inner join({{combo SQL Sentence}}) cmb1 On cmb1.{{combo ValueFiled }}= {{PATH Object Table}}.{{FILTER Propertyname}} -- BUILD WHERE where -- BUILD FILTER (o.Descrip Like '%x%' or o.ObjectName like '%x%' or Objects_properties.PropertyName like '%x%' or cmb1.descrip like '%' ) -- BUILD RELATION And {{Main Object Table}}.{{Main Object Table primary Key}} = o.{{Main Object Table primary Key}} )
